ygData.subject: Re: [spoiler] Shimmering Orb
ygData.msgSnippet: Im sorry but where is this ?, I mean what dungeon? Sounds cool Jaezebel Moonsong Gypsy Bard of the 20th Stanza Innoruuk ... From: Brendan
ygData.messageBody:
Im sorry but where is this ?, I mean what dungeon?

Sounds cool
Jaezebel Moonsong
Gypsy Bard of the 20th Stanza
Innoruuk

-----Original Message-----
From: Brendan <brendan@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 10:13 PM
Subject: [eqbards] [spoiler] Shimmering Orb


>From: Brendan <brendan@...>
>
>from the entrance, just take the first right, swim through the water, past
>the spiders, and down the stairs. you will end up in the scryer room. the
>shimmering orb is a great shield for bards, i borrow one from my enchanter
>friend when i'm in a party with several tanks since i know i'll be taking
>a large percentage of the hits because of bard hate.
>
>on fennin ro, they can sell for outrageous amounts of money. some people
>only seem willing to buy them for 250pp, but i sold one last week for
>600pp.. and i've heard they used to go for 800 or 1000. yowza.
>
>
><*baal*> it's not my fault
><*baal*> i'm just made cute!
>
